The five days debate at Cicero's house in Tusculum between master and sophister. Tusculanae disputationes. English Cicero, Marcus Tullius. Wase, Christopher, 1625?-1690.
[14], 343, [23] p.
Printed for Abel Swalle ..., London : 1683.
Translation of: Tusculanae disputationes. Translated by Christopher Wase. Cf. BM. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library. Comforts against death -- Patience under pain -- The cure of discontent -- The government of the passions -- The chief end of man.
=======
